item.title: Resume in RMarkdown
item.description: One of my professional goals this year is to use blogging as a medium to practice skills related to data science.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello there! My name is Sneha Kannan. I am a highly motivated, result oriented data scientist with almost 5 years of experience applying statistical learning to solving challenging business problems.
